attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: This app made my phone EXPLODE! Okay not literally but it got really hot and the screen went white and the phone wouldn’t turn back on, I’m writing this review from the phone I had to waste money on which was a lot for a broke college student. Entirely not worth it.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: It keeps asking for my phone number and I don’t wanna give it to them. And I’m not apart of the Tic Toc . Trump should learn some Boundaries. All I wanted was to check out his plan for 2020. And also would like to complain about some of the thins he says. ITS DISGUSTING!!  Trump is for surely not getting my vote.

attributes.review: 𝔡𝔬𝔫𝔞𝔩𝔡 𝔱𝔯𝔲𝔪𝔭 𝔦𝔰 𝔞 𝔴𝔥𝔦𝔱𝔢 𝔰𝔲𝔭𝔯𝔢𝔪𝔞𝔠𝔦𝔰𝔱𝔰. ℑ𝔣 𝔶𝔬𝔲 𝔳𝔬𝔱𝔢 𝔣𝔬𝔯 𝔥𝔦𝔪 𝔱𝔥𝔢𝔫 𝔞𝔤𝔞𝔦𝔫 𝔶𝔬𝔲’𝔯𝔢 𝔞 𝔴𝔥𝔦𝔱𝔢 𝔰𝔲𝔭𝔯𝔢𝔪𝔞𝔠𝔦𝔰𝔱𝔰. 𝔡𝔬𝔫𝔞𝔩𝔡 𝔱𝔯𝔲𝔪𝔭 𝔦𝔰 𝔞 𝔴𝔥𝔦𝔱𝔢 𝔰𝔲𝔭𝔯𝔢𝔪𝔞𝔠𝔦𝔰𝔱𝔰. attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.userName: d trump? more like d DUMP

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to join team trump on their adventure and see more about them. But when I went in the app for a couple of minutes it glitched me out. Something popped up and said I had a virus called lickma. I got soooo many glitches on my phone now. Not to mention when I went back on the app it had bugs and still kept glitching me out after awhile.

I am no longer a supporter of him or his team  if he won’t even fix the minor things that had happened.

💫🧚✨🧚‍♀️ ♡ ＼(^ω^)／🖤ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ

Don’t delete tiktok me orange man If u do it u realize people are going to be nuts that’ll make people wanna assassinate u more stupid orange peel

attributes.review: This app crashed my phone and also kept kicking me out of the app when I wanted to know the news about Trump but then the app also hacked into my stuff and got all my information. I do not recommend this app at all unless you want people to have your personal information.
